title: SF_Antivalent (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SF_Antivalent
This function block converts two antivalent SAFEBOOL inputs (NO/NC pair) to one SAFEBOOL output with discrepancy time monitoring.
This FB should not be used stand-alone since it has no restart interlock. It is required to connect the output to other safety related functionalities.
Function block according to PLCopen, Technical Committee 5: Safety Software (Technical Specification), Part 1: Concepts and Function Blocks, Version 2.01 (2020-2)

rows:
Input for NC (Normally Closed) connection. FALSE: NC contact
open, TRUE: NC contact closed.

Input for NO (Normally Open) connection. FALSE: NO contact
open, TRUE: NO contact closed.

Maximum monitoring time for discrepancy status of both
inputs

rows.Name: Ready
rows.Comment:
Activation of the FB. TRUE indicates that the FB is
activated and the outputs results are valid, FALSE the FB is
not active and the program is not executed.

rows:
Output indicating that the FB is active and the primary
safety function is demanded (e.g. related to the safety
functionality).
